(:action build ; Build or transform a resource and update its state
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?tool - tool)
  :precondition (and (initial_state ?entity) (usable ?tool))
  :effect (transformed ?entity)
)

(:action pour ; Pour a substance and transition its state
    :parameters (?substance - entity ?container - entity)
    :precondition (and (pourable ?substance) (receivable ?container))
    :effect (and (contained ?substance ?container) (transformed ?substance))

(:action freeze ; Freeze an item and update its state
  :parameters (?item - object)
  :precondition (and (in_molds ?item) (liquid ?item))
  :effect (and (frozen ?item) (solid ?item))
